## AddrPort arrays: Try these addresses in turn. Use the first that responds properly.
If QLab has a passcode, add it after the port as '/passcode'.
## QLabDefaultCueList: Default QLab cuelist to add missing EOS cues to.
## QLabNetworkPatch: Network patch for EOS Network cues added to QLab.
## CueColor: Color for cues added to QLab. none, red, orange, green, blue, purple.
## CueFlagged: If true, 'flag' EOS cues added to QLab.
## CueNumber: Format for the QLab cue number for EOS cues added to QLab.
Variables are %list%, the EOS cuelist number,
and %number%, the number part of the EOS cue.
Also, a variable reference in the format %prefix{list}suffix%
is a conditional reference. If the variable {} is specified,
insert the variable's value, with the indicated prefix & suffix
(if any). But if the variable in {} isn't specified -- or for {list},
isn't necessary because this EOS only has one cue list --
The default value is q%{list}-%%number%. For cue 1/101,
that evaluates to q-101 if cuelist 1 is the only EOS cuelist,
or q1-101 if EOS has multiple cuelists.
## CueNameFromLabel: Format for the QLab cue name for EOS cues added to QLab
which do not have a label in EOS.
As with CueNumber, a variable reference with {} is conditional.
Additional variables are label, the EOS cue label,
and sceneend, which is defined if this cue is marked as a scene end.
## CueNameNoLabel: Like CueNameFromLabel, but for EOS cues without a label.
## ConnectTimeoutMS: The wait-time, in millisec, when connecting to QLab or EOS.
